desc.p: This field contains the weighted Inflow . This field is defaulted from the corresponding field in AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL. This field can be manually changed .
Associated Multi-value along with the PERF.DATE field.

Contains the date of
performance calculation. Defaulted from the corresponding AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL record.
Validation Rules:
Standard T24 DATE type field.
Head of the Multi-value set.

desc.p: This field indicates whether the particular Multi-value has been manually update or recalculated due to a backvalue deal.
The valid values for this field are as follows:
1. M - The performance has been manually updated.
2. R - The performance has been recalculated because of a backvalue field.
3. P - The AM.INST.VEH file for the corresponding month has been purged.
This field is defaulted from the MV.RC.INFLOW field of AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL . This field can be manually changed.
Should be a positive value or zero.
Associated Multi-value with the PERF.DATE field.

This field contains the total of all the PL values. The field is defaulted from the field TOTAL.PL.RC of AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL. This field is a NOINPUT field and is recalculated if any of the PL values is changed.
Contains the Start of Day market value for a particular. This field is defaulted from the corresponding field in AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL.

Contains the Outflow as of the date defined in PERF.DATE. This field is again defaulted from the corresponding MV.RC.OUTFLOW field in AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL. On changing this field manually the INDEX gets recalculated.
This field contains the weighted outflows. This field is defaulted from the corresponding MV.RC.AICOUTFLOW field of the AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL record. This field can be manually changed.
The ID of this record should be a valid AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL record id. A new record cannnot be input using this application. Only an existing record can be modified.

This field contains the End of day market value. This field is defaulted from MV.RC.EOD field of the AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL record. This field can be manually changed . On manual updation of this field TOT.INDEX field will be recalculated.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

This field contains the Index for a given date. This field is a NOINPUT field which gets updated when the flow or the EOD market value is changed. This field is defaulted from the TOT.INDEX field of the AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL record.
This field contains the Capital pl for a given instrument on a given date. This field can be manually changed. On updation of this field the field TOTAL.PL will be automatically recalculated.

Contains the Fees PL for a given date. This field is defaulted from FEES.PL.RC from the AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL record. On manually changing this field , the field TOTAL.PL.RC will get automatically updated.
Associated Multi-Value along with PERF.DATE field.

This field contains the FOREX.PL.RC for a given portfolio. This field is defaulted from the corresponding field FOREX.PL.RC from AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL. On manual updation of this field, the field TOTAL.PL.RC will automatically get recalculated.

This field contains the Income Pl for a given date. This field is defaulted from the INCOME.PL.RC field of AM.INST.PERF.DETAIL. The field can be manually changed. On changing the value of this field. TOTAL.PL.RC will be automatically recalculated.
Associated Multi-Value along with PERF.DATE field.
